items.sentence: By the time we got there, there was only one puppy left, so we ended up getting the runt of the litter.
Tom didn't have any money to buy Mary a birthday present, so he wrote her some terrible poetry instead.
We carry out treatments like whitening. We also do tobacco stain removal and other cleaning procedures.
A good way to boost reading and listening skills in a target language is to read or listen to the news.
Tom wanted a fancy folding pocketknife with a corkscrew, screwdriver head, and a tiny pair of scissors.
I live in a country where the cost of a liter of gasoline is cheaper than the cost of a liter of water.
In this harsh, petty world where money does the talking, his way of life is like a breath of fresh air.
Mary puckered her lips, expecting a kiss, but nothing happened. When she opened her eyes, Tom had gone.
My Japanese teacher used to use a song to help us remember verb conjugations. No one really sang along.
I never see a library without wishing I had time to go there and stay till I had read everything in it.
